Review Text: I don't know if the character was written specifically for Tim Olyphant, but I can't imagine anyone else playing Raylan Givens, and Olyphant plays Raylan perfectly. This show has everything I like: great, character-driven stories, suspense, romance, action, comedy, you-name-it. In my opinion, Justified couldn’t exist without Raylan Givens, but almost as important is Walton Goggins' Boyd Crowder. I love the chemistry between these two charismatic men, and the fact that the line between good and evil is blurry. It's shows like Justified that make me occasionally fantasize buying a cable subscription.
Review Title: Timothy Olyphant is Raylan Givens
